game.name: One Song, One Life
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 자막 옵션, 서라운드 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: “One Song, One Life” is a rhythm adventure game where the music and story change based on the notes you hit. Take control of Sumire Kirishima, a girl striving to become the ultimate net artist and perform alongside her idol. Your performance will shape her destiny—one song, one life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: “One Song, One Life” is a rhythm adventure game where the music and story change based on the notes you hit. Take control of Sumire Kirishima, a girl striving to become the ultimate net artist and perform alongside her idol. Your performance will shape her destiny—one song, one life.
